response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and significance to you, I propose an offer of $16,500 for the product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the exclusive access it provides to you. Should you decide to accept this offer, we can arrange for immediate delivery and ensure a smooth transaction. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 16500}
